manifest:
# GMS build flags, false by default # ship with GMS packages, replaces default AOSP packages with Google manufactured packages. WITH_GMS := true/false
# These flags needs WITH_GMS set to true # Whether to ship pixel launcher and set it as default launcher, false by default TARGET_DEFAULT_PIXEL_LAUNCHER := true/false
# Whether to ship prebuilt Google Dialer and Messages, false by default TARGET_INCLUDE_GOOGLE_DIALER := true/false
